Hack.display_help: You Hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Hack.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Slash.display_help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Slice.display_help: You Slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. Slice does less damage than Slash, but can hit multiple foes and reduce their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Slice.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Parry.display_help: You can use this power to Parry incoming melee attacks. The Parry itself does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Whirling_Sword.display_help: You perform a Whirling Sword maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take minor damage over time and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Whirling_Sword.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Disembowel.display_help: You perform a powerful Disemboweling maneuver that deals a great amount of damage, and can knock a target up into the air. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Disembowel.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Head_Splitter.display_help: You perform a devastating Head Splitter attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. This attack has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Broadsword attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Head_Splitter.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Nimble_Slash.display_help: A quick swipe with your blades. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. This attack begins both the Empower and Weaken combination attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Power_Slice.display_help: You perform a deadly Strike with your blades. This is a basic attack that deals a moderate amount of lethal damage. This power is needed for the Sweep combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Ablating_Strike.display_help: You Slash at your foe with your blades, dealing a good amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This power is needed for the Empower and Weaken combination attacks, and is the beginning of the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Ablating_Strike.display_target_help: The blades have reduced your Defenses.

Typhoons_Edge.display_help: You spin around in a circle, attacking everyone within melee range with a striking attack. This attack is the finishing move in both the Weaken and Sweep combination attacks. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Typhoons_Edge.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Defenses have been reduced by the Weaken combo!

Blinding_Feint.display_help: You perform a feint attack that deals light damage. After this attack hits, it gives you a large bonus to your chance to hit and damage for a brief time. This power is the finishing move in the Empower combination attack. Damage: Light, Recharge: Slow
Blinding_Feint.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} attack has increased your attack and damage for a short duration.

Vengeful_Slice.display_help: Unleashes a series of strong attacks on your foe, dealing high lethal damage and knocking them down. This power is needed for the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Sweeping_Strike.display_help: You make a sweeping strike with your blades, hitting all foes in a cone in front of you and dealing superior lethal damage to each. This power is the finishing move for the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Superior Recharge: Moderate

One_Thousand_Cuts.display_help: Unleashes a flurry of attacks on all foes in a cone in front of you, dealing moderate lethal damage to each foe hit. This power is the opening move for the Sweep combination attack. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Sting_of_the_Wasp.display_help: You perform a standard attack with your katana. This attack is slower than Gambler's Cut, but deals more damage. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Sting_of_the_Wasp.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Gamblers_Cut.display_help: You perform a quick slash with your katana. This attack is very fast, but deals only minor damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Gamblers_Cut.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Flashing_Steel.display_help: You swing your katana in a wide arc in front of you, slicing multiple foes. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Flashing_Steel.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Divine_Avalanche.display_help: You can use your katana to parry incoming melee attacks and then quickly return the favor. Divine Avalanche does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

The_Lotus_Drops.display_help: You perform The Lotus Drops maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take moderate damage over time and reduces their Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
The_Lotus_Drops.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Soaring_Dragon.display_help: You perform a powerful Soaring Dragon maneuver that deals a great amount of damage, and can knock a target up into the air. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Soaring_Dragon.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Golden_Dragonfly.display_help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. This attack has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Katana attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Golden_Dragonfly.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Resistance.display_help: Hercules Titans are resistant to all damage. Since they are machines, they are immune to Sleep and Fear powers.
Resistance.display_short_help: Self Auto, Res(All), Res Sleep, Fear
Resistance.display_target_help: Hercules Titans are resistant to all damage. Since they are machines, they are immune to Sleep and Fear powers.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Self Auto, Res(All), Res Sleep, Fear

Hack.display_help: The attack has lowered your defense.

Slash.display_help: The attack has lowered your defense.

Slice.display_help: The attack has lowered your defense.

Parry.display_help: You can use this power to Parry incoming melee attacks. The Parry itself does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Whirling_Sword.display_help: The attack has lowered your defense.

Disembowel.display_help: The attack has lowered your defense.

True_Love.display_help: If Neuron is weaker than Bobcat, Bobcat gains more damage in response.

True_Love_Death.display_help: When Neuron is defeated, Bobcat becomes fully enraged.
True_Love_Death.display_attacker_attack_floater: Neuron swears to avenge Bobcat's defeat

True_Love_Badge.display_help: When Neuron is defeated, Bobcat becomes fully enraged.

True_Love_Revenge.display_help: If Neuron is weaker than Bobcat, Bobcat gains more damage in response.

Strength_in_Numbers.display_help: Each Goliath contains tactical cloud sharing which greatly increases the combat effectiveness of nearby units.

TransLocation_Beam.display_help: Police Drones are most effective. Any unwanted riff raff that wanders into the protected zones will be quickly whisked away.

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.
Brawl.display_target_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.

Taser.display_help: The Malta Tactical Ops soldier has Disoriented you with his Taser.
Taser.display_target_help: The Malta Tactical Ops soldier has Disoriented you with his Taser.

Adv_Assault_Rifle.display_help: Your Defense has been lowered by the Malta Tactical Ops Advanced Assault Rifle.
Adv_Assault_Rifle.display_target_help: Your Defense has been lowered by the Malta Tactical Ops Advanced Assault Rifle.

Frag_Grenade.display_help: This explosion from this Fragmentation Grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.
Frag_Grenade.display_target_help: This explosion from this Fragmentation Grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.

Web_Grenade.display_help: The Malta Tactical Ops soldier has snared you in his Web Grenade. You are Immobilized, cannot fly, and your attack speed is reduced.
Web_Grenade.display_target_help: The Malta Tactical Ops soldier has snared you in his Web Grenade. You are Immobilized, cannot fly, and your attack speed is reduced.

Stun_Grenades.display_help: The Malta Tactical Ops soldier has Disoriented you with his Stun Grenade.
Stun_Grenades.display_target_help: The Malta Tactical Ops soldier has Disoriented you with his Stun Grenade.

Tactical_Retreat.display_help: Director 11 can make a tactical retreat.

Resistance.display_help: The Explosive Trap is fragile, but cannot be affected by secondary effects like Sleep, Disorient, or Fear.

Super_Speed.display_help: You can run at super-human speeds! While running at such speeds, you are a blur, and many foes will not even notice you as you speed past them. If you attack a target while this power is on, you will temporarily be slowed to normal speed. You must be at least level 14 and have Flurry or Hasten before selecting Super Speed.

True_Love.display_help: If Bobcat is weaker than Neuron, Neuron activates more clones in response.

Activate_Clones.display_help: Neuron can activate many of his clones to fight alongside him.

True_Love_Death.display_help: When Neuron is defeated, Bobcat becomes fully enraged.
True_Love_Death.display_attacker_attack_floater: Bobcat swears to avenge Neuron's defeat

True_Love_Revenge.display_help: If Bobcat is weaker than Neuron, Neuron activates more clones in response.

Super_Speed.display_help: You can run at super-human speeds! While running at such speeds, you are a blur, and many foes will not even notice you as you speed past them. If you attack a target while this power is on, you will temporarily be slowed to normal speed. You must be at least level 14 and have Flurry or Hasten before selecting Super Speed.

ADHD.display_help: Neuron's Clones suffer from a severe attention-deficit problem and can sometimes zip off without any real reason.

Charged_Bolts.display_help: Neuron has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery with his Charged Bolt.
Charged_Bolts.display_target_help: Neuron has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery with his Charged Bolt.

Lightning_Bolt.display_help: Neuron has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery with his Lightning Bolt.
Lightning_Bolt.display_target_help: Neuron has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery with his Lightning Bolt.

Charged_Brawl.display_help: Neuron has electrocuted you and temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery with his Charged Brawl.
Charged_Brawl.display_target_help: Neuron has electrocuted you and temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery with his Charged Brawl.

Lightning_Field.display_help: The Lightning Field is causing minor damage over time to you and draining your endurance.
Lightning_Field.display_target_help: The Lightning Field is causing minor damage over time to you and draining your endurance.

Proximity_Mine.display_help: All foes that pass near this Explosive Trap will get blown to smithereens.

Resistance.display_help: The Explosive Trap is fragile, but cannot be affected by secondary effects like Sleep, Disorient, or Fear.

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.
Power_Bolt.display_target_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
Power_Blast.display_target_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

Explosive_Blast.display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.
Explosive_Blast.display_target_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

Energy_Torrent.display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.
Energy_Torrent.display_target_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

Power_Burst.display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow
Power_Burst.display_target_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

Power_Thrust.display_help: A focused attack that violently shoves the target and sends him flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Power_Thrust.display_target_help: A powerful thrust from the Ballista that does smashing and energy damage and knocks you back.

Whirling_Hands.display_help: A Whirling Hands attack from the Hero has Disoriented you.
Whirling_Hands.display_target_help: A Whirling Hands attack from the Hero has Disoriented you.

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Bifurcate.display_attacker_attack_floater: Trapdoor bifurcates and begins to regenerate
